gr.interamerican.wicket.callback
Interface ChainedCallbackAction

All Superinterfaces:
CallbackAction, Called<org.apache.wicket.Component>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChainedCallbackActionImpl
public interface ChainedCallbackAction
extends CallbackAction

Chain of responsibility enhancement of CallbackAction.
A ChainedCallbackAction is a CallbackAction that provides facilities for inversion of control by allowing components to chain, before or after, other CallbackActions.
These methods should be used before execution of the callback. If they are used after, a RuntimeException should be thrown.

Method Summary
 void chainAfter(CallbackAction action)
          Chains the specified action after any other actions currently chained.
 void chainBefore(CallbackAction action)
          Chains the specified action before any other actions currently chained.
